title: Certification and Benefit Period UI
description:
Implement Healthcare Certification and Benefit Period Management System with Face-to-Face Compliance Tracking

Build a complete healthcare certification management interface that tracks certification lifecycles, benefit periods, and face-to-face encounter compliance requirements with real-time deadline monitoring and documentation management.

Core Data Model:
- Design schema for certifications (ID, patient reference, certification type, start/end dates, status, renewal history)
- Define benefit periods structure (period ID, parent certification, coverage dates, authorization details)
- Create face-to-face encounters model (encounter date, provider, documentation references, compliance status, recorded timestamp)
- Establish relationships and foreign key constraints between certifications, benefit periods, and encounters
- Include audit fields (created by, modified by, timestamps) for compliance tracking

Certification Management:
- Create certification entry form with required fields (patient, type, dates, authorization number)
- Implement certification listing with sortable columns (patient name, type, status, start date, end date, compliance)
- Build certification detail view showing full history, associated benefit periods, and face-to-face requirements
- Add certification editing with change history logging
- Support certification renewal workflow that carries forward relevant data
- Enable certification status transitions (draft → active → expiring → expired → renewed)
- Implement soft delete with archival for data retention compliance

Benefit Period Management:
- Create benefit period creation/editing interface linked to parent certification
- Display benefit periods in chronological timeline view under parent certification
- Validate benefit period dates fall within certification date range
- Support gap detection between consecutive benefit periods
- Handle benefit period extensions and modifications
- Show coverage status for each period (active, upcoming, completed)

Face-to-Face Requirement Tracking:
- Implement requirement deadline calculator based on certification rules (e.g., 30/60/90 days from certification start)
- Create encounter recording form (date, provider name, encounter type, notes, attachments)
- Build document upload functionality with file type validation (PDF, images) and size limits
- Display countdown timer showing days until face-to-face deadline
- Implement color-coded status indicators:
  - Green: Compliant (encounter recorded before deadline)
  - Yellow: Warning (deadline approaching within 7-14 days)
  - Red: Overdue (deadline passed without recorded encounter)
  - Gray: Not yet required
- Show compliance status badge on certification cards and lists
- Allow retroactive encounter recording with timestamp audit trail
- Validate encounter date is not in the future or before certification start

Dashboard and Reporting:
- Build summary dashboard showing:
  - Total active certifications count
  - Certifications expiring within 30/60/90 days
  - Face-to-face compliance rate percentage
  - Overdue face-to-face encounters count and list
  - Recently added/modified certifications
- Implement filtering by:
  - Certification status (active, expired, pending, renewed)
  - Compliance status (compliant, warning, overdue)
  - Date ranges (start date, end date, encounter date)
  - Patient/client name or ID
  - Certification type
- Add sorting capabilities for all list views
- Create exportable reports (CSV/PDF) for compliance audits

User Interface Components:
- Design hierarchical layout: Certifications (parent) → Benefit Periods (child) → Face-to-Face Requirements (nested)
- Use expandable/collapsible sections for certification details
- Implement calendar view option for visualizing certification timelines
- Add quick action buttons (Edit, Renew, Add Encounter, View Documents)
- Show inline validation errors with specific guidance
- Include confirmation modals for delete/archive actions
- Display loading states for asynchronous operations
- Implement responsive grid/card layout adapting to screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)

Validation and Business Rules:
- Prevent end date before start date for certifications and benefit periods
- Enforce benefit period dates within parent certification date range
- Validate encounter date is within certification active period
- Warn when creating overlapping certifications for same patient
- Require face-to-face encounter before certification end date (configurable grace period)
- Prevent deletion of certifications with recorded encounters (require archive instead)
- Validate file uploads meet security requirements (virus scanning, allowed types)

Edge Cases and Error Handling:
- Handle certifications created without initial benefit period (allow later addition)
- Support multiple face-to-face encounters per certification (e.g., recertification scenarios)
- Manage retroactive encounter recording that changes compliance status
- Process certification renewals while preserving historical data
- Handle bulk import/update scenarios with validation and rollback
- Display appropriate messaging when no certifications exist
- Recover gracefully from failed document uploads
- Handle timezone differences for encounter dates and deadlines
- Support concurrent edits with optimistic locking or conflict detection

Performance and Scalability:
- Implement pagination for certification lists (default 25-50 per page)
- Add search functionality with debouncing for patient/certification lookup
- Optimize queries for compliance status calculations
- Cache summary statistics with appropriate invalidation
- Lazy load benefit periods and encounters until certification expanded

Security and Compliance:
- Implement role-based access control (view, create, edit, delete permissions)
- Log all data modifications for audit trail
- Encrypt document uploads at rest
- Validate user permissions before state-changing operations
- Sanitize all user inputs to prevent XSS/injection attacks

Success Criteria:
- Users can create and manage complete certification lifecycle in under 2 minutes
- Compliance status visible at a glance without clicking into details
- Zero missed face-to-face deadlines due to unclear UI indicators
- 100% of date validation prevents invalid configurations
- Dashboard loads and displays summary metrics within 1 second
- All file uploads complete with progress feedback and error handling
